newsItems.title: New Study Explores Depression and its Link to Chronic Stress
newsItems.summary: Researchers have uncovered strong connections between chronic stress and depression, shedding light on new treatment approaches.

newsItems.title: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy: A Proven Method for Treating Depression
newsItems.summary: CBT remains one of the most effective non-pharmacological treatments for managing depression, offering patients tools for long-term mental health management.

newsItems.title: The Global Rise of Depression in the Wake of the Pandemic
newsItems.summary: The COVID-19 pandemic has contributed to a global surge in depression cases, highlighting the need for better mental health services and resources.
